page.title: 04TRADE GARDEN CENTRE LUTON
page.content: We went to Farr's garden centre it has been open since October 1982. They sell tropical fish, snakes they used to have piranas. Some fish are kept inside and some outside. There was a snake about to eat a live mouse. The centre opens at 9.30am and closes at 6pm. The weekend is the busiest time especially Sunday. Deliveries to the centre are on Wednesday. There are car parks at side and back. There is a fun slide for children. They sell swimming pools, greenhouses, sheds,bricks and fences. Outside are benches and chairs inside patio sets for sale. Inside and outside are flowers and plants as well as seeds. There are garden tools, ddustbins and grills for barbecues.
